sqlMap.sql: INSERT INTO order_alipay( gmtCreate, price, discount, buyerEmail, sellerEmail, tradeNo, buyerId, sellerId, subject, paymentType, notifyTime, body, useCoupon, gmtPayment, tradeStatus, totalFee, notifyId, signType, outTradeNo, notifyType, quantity, isTotalFeeAdjust) values ( :gmtCreate, :price, :discount, :buyerEmail, :sellerEmail, :tradeNo, :buyerId, :sellerId, :subject, :paymentType, :notifyTime, :body, :useCoupon, :gmtPayment, :tradeStatus, :totalFee, :notifyId, :signType, :outTradeNo, :notifyType, :quantity, :isTotalFeeAdjust)

UPDATE order_alipay SET gmtCreate = :gmtCreate <#if price?exists && price != ""> , price = :price </#if> <#if discount?exists && discount != ""> , discount = :discount </#if> <#if buyerEmail?exists && buyerEmail != ""> , buyerEmail = :buyerEmail </#if> <#if sellerEmail?exists && sellerEmail != ""> , sellerEmail = :sellerEmail </#if> <#if tradeNo?exists && tradeNo != ""> , tradeNo = :tradeNo </#if> <#if buyerId?exists && buyerId != ""> , buyerId = :buyerId </#if> <#if sellerId?exists && sellerId != ""> , sellerId = :sellerId </#if> <#if subject?exists && subject != ""> , subject = :subject </#if> <#if paymentType?exists && paymentType != ""> , paymentType = :paymentType </#if> <#if notifyTime?exists && notifyTime != ""> , notifyTime = :notifyTime </#if> <#if body?exists && body != ""> , body = :body </#if> <#if useCoupon?exists && useCoupon != ""> , useCoupon = :useCoupon </#if> <#if gmtPayment?exists && gmtPayment != ""> , gmtPayment = :gmtPayment </#if> <#if tradeStatus?exists && tradeStatus != ""> , tradeStatus = :tradeStatus </#if> <#if totalFee?exists && totalFee != ""> , totalFee = :totalFee </#if> <#if notifyId?exists && notifyId != ""> , notifyId = :notifyId </#if> <#if signType?exists && signType != ""> , signType = :signType </#if> <#if outTradeNo?exists && outTradeNo != ""> , outTradeNo = :outTradeNo </#if> <#if notifyType?exists && notifyType != ""> , notifyType = :notifyType </#if> <#if quantity?exists && quantity != ""> , quantity = :quantity </#if> <#if isTotalFeeAdjust?exists && isTotalFeeAdjust != ""> , isTotalFeeAdjust = :isTotalFeeAdjust </#if> WHERE id = :id

DELETE FROM order_alipay WHERE 1=1 <#if gmtCreate?exists && gmtCreate != ""> AND gmtCreate = :gmtCreate </#if> <#if price?exists && price != ""> AND price = :price </#if> <#if discount?exists && discount != ""> AND discount = :discount </#if> <#if buyerEmail?exists && buyerEmail != ""> AND buyerEmail = :buyerEmail </#if> <#if sellerEmail?exists && sellerEmail != ""> AND sellerEmail = :sellerEmail </#if> <#if tradeNo?exists && tradeNo != ""> AND tradeNo = :tradeNo </#if> <#if buyerId?exists && buyerId != ""> AND buyerId = :buyerId </#if> <#if sellerId?exists && sellerId != ""> AND sellerId = :sellerId </#if> <#if subject?exists && subject != ""> AND subject = :subject </#if> <#if paymentType?exists && paymentType != ""> AND paymentType = :paymentType </#if> <#if notifyTime?exists && notifyTime != ""> AND notifyTime = :notifyTime </#if> <#if body?exists && body != ""> AND body = :body </#if> <#if useCoupon?exists && useCoupon != ""> AND useCoupon = :useCoupon </#if> <#if gmtPayment?exists && gmtPayment != ""> AND gmtPayment = :gmtPayment </#if> <#if tradeStatus?exists && tradeStatus != ""> AND tradeStatus = :tradeStatus </#if> <#if totalFee?exists && totalFee != ""> AND totalFee = :totalFee </#if> <#if notifyId?exists && notifyId != ""> AND notifyId = :notifyId </#if> <#if signType?exists && signType != ""> AND signType = :signType </#if> <#if outTradeNo?exists && outTradeNo != ""> AND outTradeNo = :outTradeNo </#if> <#if notifyType?exists && notifyType != ""> AND notifyType = :notifyType </#if> <#if quantity?exists && quantity != ""> AND quantity = :quantity </#if> <#if isTotalFeeAdjust?exists && isTotalFeeAdjust != ""> AND isTotalFeeAdjust = :isTotalFeeAdjust </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if>
